parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects shape (actual type) of the local marker. The shape can be:
* <tt>"ICON"</tt>
* <tt>"RECTANGLE"</tt>
* <tt>"ELLIPSE"</tt>
* <tt>"POLYLINE"</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerShapeLocal''' shape

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> shape: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"Marker1" [[setMarkerShapeLocal]] "RECTANGLE";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerAlpha]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]], [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerBrushLocal]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerDirLocal]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerPosLocal]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerSizeLocal]], [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]], [[setMarkerType]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]
</value></part></template>
